game.name: Dave.EXE
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 서라운드 사운드, Steam Cloud, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Time travel and explore different worlds to save the universe from the evil overlord, Edgy Dave. Empty vending machines of their soda, go on various errands and evade E.D's goons as you desperately run for your life in this goofy comedy horror game!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Time travel and explore different worlds to save the universe from the evil overlord, Edgy Dave. Empty vending machines of their soda, go on various errands and evade E.D's goons as you desperately run for your life in this goofy comedy horror game!
